EmailTemplate.name: Re-admission Offer - MUM Template
EmailTemplate.subject: MUM Monash Offer of Re-Admission - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I am pleased to attach an electronic copy of your Letter of Candidature Offer for postgraduate study at Monash University Malaysia. Please note that I will not be sending any hard copies by post.
Action Required:
Copies of the intellectual property and ethics clearance forms are included with this offer. If you now have new arrangements affecting IP and or ethics you must submit new completed forms at the time of enrolment.
Please ensure that you carefully read the conditions on your offer and make sure that you meet them either at acceptance or upon enrolment. It may not be possible for you to complete your enrolment until you meet all conditions on your offer. This especially applies to conditions where you are required to provide original or duly certified copies of supporting documentation, such as academic transcripts and birth certificate prior to your enrolment.
If you require any further assistance or should you have any queries please contact us by email at:
mge-candidature.monash.edu
Kind regards
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
